def_cn: 像样的;尚好的;过得去的
def_en: Decent is used to describe something which is considered to be of an acceptable standard or quality.

def_cn: 合宜的;得体的;适当的;正当的
def_en: Decent is used to describe something which is morally correct or acceptable.

def_cn: （人）正派的，正直的，规矩的
def_en: Decent people are honest and behave in a way that most people approve of.

def_cn: 做（不想做但）应该做的事
def_en: If you say that someone should do the decent thing, you mean that they should do something which they do not really want to do, but which you think they ought to do.
